head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WEEKS, JAMES C

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WEEKS, JAMES C

block.p: WEEKS--James C, on January 8, 2007. The staff and Board of the Atlantic Theater Company mourn the loss of James C. Weeks, father of our beloved Company member, Todd Weeks. Our deepest condolences go out to Todd, his sister Traci, their stepmother Toney Thomas, and to all the members of their family on his very sudden passing.
